title: Next Star Guardian Idea
body: What if the next Star Guardian event had Kayle and Morgana in it? Kayle being a Star Guardian and Morgana being a Dark Star Guardian like Zoe, Xayah, and Rakan. That'd be cool

replies.body:
https://i.redd.it/z7eczuqy0yoz.png

Let it be done, Riot.
That'd be pretty cool. They could make Kayle and Morgana legendary skins, and maybe add LeBlanc, Akali and Lissandra to the skin lines. An all-bad-girls team. :D

how about {{champion:420}} 

she could be a dark star guardian. she's basically worshipping cthulu anyway so

I was thinking a girl with {{champion:34}} as her familiar fused like sg {{champion:81}} does when he ults.



We really need more top lane star guardians and like, even one jungler. {{champion:113}} riding a familiar, {{champion:60}} with little familiar spiders, {{champion:254}} or {{champion:28}} would be good choices for jungler.



Pretty much any female toplaner would work but I don't have any particularly good ideas.
God I hope not.. Kayle and morgana do not need more skins. Make skins, not skins for bland champs that already have 12+ skins
